MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA6 and KA7 areas of Ayr and Alloway, affecting properties in Dutch Mill and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am due to repairs required to our overhead electricity network near Glenlea Cottage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:51am on Monday, 29 March 2021
